recipe.title: Salt Water Intrusion
instructions: Step 1: Mix salt and water in a bowl until well combined.
Step 2: Stir the mixture for an additional 2 minutes to ensure thorough dissolution.

recipe.title: Banana and More Recipe
instructions: "cooking_time": "20-25 minutes",
Note: Make sure to use all the provided ingredients: banana, sardines, chocolate, pickles

recipe.title: Savory Chicken and Veggie Stir Fry
instructions: Step 1: Prepare the chicken and vegetables
Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breast and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
Add the sliced mushrooms, bell peppers, and broccoli to the skillet. Cook for an additional 3-5 minutes or until the vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Step 2: Prepare the sauce
In a small bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, sesame oil, and 1 tablespoon of water. Set aside.
Step 3: Stir-fry the chicken and vegetables
Add the cooked chicken breast to the skillet with the vegetables. Pour the sauce over the top and stir to coat everything evenly.
Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and the chicken is coated.
Step 4: Serve and garnish
Divide the stir-fry onto four plates. Garnish with chopped green onions, sesame seeds, and additional soy sauce or sesame oil if desired.
Serve immediately.

issues: Unused ingredients: rice, carrots, eggs, garlic, ginger, chili flakes

recipe.title: Tofu and Veggie Rice Bowl
instructions: Step 1: Cook the rice according to package instructions.
Step 2: Cut the tofu into small cubes and sauté in a pan with some oil until golden brown.
Step 3: Add the vegetables (such as broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers) to the pan and stir-fry for a few minutes.
Step 4: Combine the cooked rice, tofu, and vegetables in a bowl and mix well.
Step 5: Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.title: Tomato Basil Pasta with Garlic and Olive Oil
instructions: Step 1: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Step 2: In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Step 3: Add tomato to the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes until softened.
Step 4: Stir in chopped basil and cook for an additional minute.
Step 5: Drain pasta and add it to the skillet with the tomato and basil mixture. Toss to combine and season with salt and pepper to taste.

recipe.title: Zucchini Chocolate Egg Muffins
instructions: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line a 12-cup muffin tin with paper liners.
Step 2: In a large bowl, whisk together eggs, sugar, and flour until well combined. Stir in grated zucchini and chocolate.
Step 3: Divide batter evenly among muffin cups. Bake for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
Step 4: Allow muffins to cool in tin for 5 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipe.title: Salmon and Quinoa Bowl with Spinach and Avocado
instructions: Step 1: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Set aside.
Step 2: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add salmon fillet and cook for 3-4 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Remove from pan and set aside.
Step 3: In the same pan, add eggs and scramble until cooked through. Set aside.
Step 4: In a separate pan, heat spinach over medium heat until wilted. Add avocado and stir to combine.
Step 5: Combine cooked quinoa, salmon, eggs, and spinach mixture in a bowl. Serve immediately.

recipe.title: Spicy Chicken and Potato Stir-Fry
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Step 2: Add the chicken wings to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked through, about 10-12 minutes.
Step 3: Add the diced potato to the skillet and cook until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
Step 4: Add the spices to the skillet and stir to combine. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Step 5: Serve hot and enjoy!

recipe.title: Cranberry Sweet Potato Turkey Meal Prep

ingredients.item: fresh herbs (such as rosemary or thyme)

instructions: Step 1: Preheat oven to 375°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Step 2: Cut the sweet potatoes into 1-inch cubes and place them on the prepared baking sheet.
Step 3: Drizzle the turkey breast with olive oil and season with salt, pepper, and fresh herbs. Place the turkey on the baking sheet alongside the sweet potatoes.
Step 4: Roast the turkey and sweet potatoes in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the turkey is cooked through and the sweet potatoes are tender.
Step 5: While the turkey and sweet potatoes are roasting, heat a pan over medium heat. Add the cranberries and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently, until they are popped and fragrant.
Step 6: Once the turkey and sweet potatoes are done, remove them from the oven and let them rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing. Serve with the roasted cranberries on top.

recipe.title: Cauliflower Chicken Cheese Bake
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Rinse the cauliflower and remove any leaves or stem. Cut it into florets.
In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower until it resembles rice.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken breast, cheese, butter, and cauliflower rice.
Mix well to combine.
Transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the top is golden brown.
Let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
